text: Song Jae-rim (; 18 February 1985 â€“ 12 November 2024) was a South Korean actor and model. He modeled for the magazines Bazaar Korea, Vogue Girl Korea, Dazed Korea, Nylon Korea, GQ Korea, Arena Homme + Korea, Esquire Korea, and Marie Claire Korea. Song began acting in 2009. He was known for his roles in Moon Embracing the Sun (2012), Two Weeks (2013), and We Got Married (2015). He was born in Seoul, South Korea. Song was found dead at his home in Seoul on 12 November 2024, aged 39. A suicide note was found at the scene. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1985 births Category:2024 deaths Category:Actors who committed suicide Category:South Korean television actors Category:South Korean models Category:Actors from Seoul
title: Song Jae-rim
